If you want to add some meta data to your specifications you can add custom fields for specifications. In our case we want to know who is responsible for a document send to a consultant and we want to know to which consultant it has beens send.
  • Open Administration > Documents & Pages> Document Custom Fields
  • Add two custom fields for a document owner which should be an enumeration of type user and a string field to specify the name of the consultant. (see screenshot)

Hint: Document custom fields are not type specific like in work items. Document custom fields will be available in all specification types.
